c func makes array of values 
```{r}
x <- c(10, 3, 3, 4)
x + 4
```

```{r}
y <- max(x)
y
```

Math on vectors computes for each element
```{r}
x^2
```
Take the mean of vector 
```{r}
x <- c(1, 3, 4, 6, 5, 6)
mean(x)
```
Standard deviation of vector
```{r} sd(x)```
